item.title: 3rd age items help plz
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

are you using PI or delta base
if pi the here is what you do
go into
item.java or might be called items.java i cannot remember
then hold ctrl then press f
so ctrl + f
now if your wanting to add a helmet to the hat section
search hat it should be thier then aload of ids under it
add the helmet id in thier correctly and it should work
it ashould look like this

public static int hats[] = {11335,4502,9096,11663,11664,11665,2679,10828,13896,13876,13864,2685,2682,2703,2688,2691,2691,2733,2736,2718,2730,2697,2715,2727,2724,2709,2706,2712,2721,2739,2700,2518,2524,2526,7319, 7321, 7323, 7325, 7327, 1167, 8077
note that is for helmet ^^

but if you sing delta â€¦well im not sure

Read full topic
